promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic serpent fighting-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracerattle, a a chibi cute epic serpent fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Swift Dive, Twin-blade. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "fighting" or "Bracerattle". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, serpent-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: This chibi-esque combatant slithers amidst ruins, using Twin-blade to ward off threats. Known for its Swift Dive, it rattles in anticipation.
